issue.title: [C++] Remove experimental status on filesystem APIs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7149](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7149). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At some point we should declare that the C++ filesystem APIs (or some of them) are not experimental anymore.
